extends java.lang.Object
    Web utilities for dealing with Users from PCF files.

      static void delete(UserCoreExt user)
      Deletes a user.
      static java.lang.String validateUsername(UserCoreExt user)
      Returns null if (a) user is existing record, and username hasn't changed; or (b) username does not already exist; or (c) the user's credential is null (a validation error which will be caught at the UI level) Otherwise, return error message as string.

      • validateUsername

        public static java.lang.String validateUsername(UserCoreExt user)
        Returns null if (a) user is existing record, and username hasn't changed; or (b) username does not already exist; or (c) the user's credential is null (a validation error which will be caught at the UI level) Otherwise, return error message as string.
        Parameters:
        user - the user to validate
        Returns:
        an error message if
